General.Name: Lindeman Asia Investment Co. Ltd
General.Description: Lindeman Asia Investment Co., Ltd. is a venture capital and private equity firm specializing in small and medium sized venture companies, equity, mezzanine, 1st, 2nd and 3rd round investments. The firm primarily makes investments in pre-IPO, middle market companies and emerging growth, operating in the bio and healthcare, chemistry and material, game and contents, ICT manufacturing, ICT service, machinery and equipment sectors. The firm typically invests in South Korea, Hong Kong, the Greater China, and the United States. The firm seeks to exit through cross-border merger and acquisition, initial public offerings, buyback and sale to third party. It also offers consulting services to its portfolio companies. Lindeman Asia Investment Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
